original: @239a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @239a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: su pra bha ta pra bha ta sto tram /
analyzed: su pra bha ta pra bha ta sto tram /
translated: SuprabhƒÅtaprabhƒÅtastotrƒÅ

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rab tu snga bar nam langs pa'i bstod pa /
analyzed: rab tu snga bar nam langs pa'i bstod pa /
translated: The Praise of the Very Early Dawn

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi mnga' bdag la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi mnga' bdag la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Lord of the Three Worlds!

original: lha yi tshogs dang grub pa dri za'i gtso dang sdom brtson dbang rnams kyis //
analyzed: lha yi tshogs dang grub pa dri za'i gtso dang sdom brtson dbang rnams kyis //
translated: The hosts of gods, siddhas, gandharva chiefs, and vow-holders

original: bstod tshig sna tshogs dag gis lha yul sa stengs rnams su bstod mod kyi //
analyzed: bstod tshig sna tshogs dag gis lha yul sa stengs rnams su bstod mod kyi //
translated: Have praised in the celestial realms and on earth with various hymns of praise.

original: bdag kyang ji ltar nus pas 'phags pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bstod bgyi ste //
analyzed: bdag kyang ji ltar nus pas 'phags pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bstod bgyi ste //
translated: I too shall praise the perfect Buddha, the Noble One, to the best of my ability.

original: nam mkha' la ni mkha' lding 'phur zhes bung ba rnams ni cis mi 'phur //
analyzed: nam mkha' la ni mkha' lding 'phur zhes bung ba rnams ni cis mi 'phur //
translated: Why don't the bees fly in the sky, saying The garuda is flying?

original: mi mthun phyogs spangs gyur pa lus pa med pa'i skyon ni zad gyur la //üîΩbtso ma gser gyi mdog can pad+ma rgyas pa lta bur yangs pa'i spyan //
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs spangs gyur pa lus pa med pa'i skyon ni zad gyur la // btso ma gser gyi mdog can pad+ma rgyas pa lta bur yangs pa'i spyan //
translated: Having abandoned unfavorable conditions, the faults are exhausted without remainder.üîΩEyes as vast as a blooming lotus, the color of refined gold,

original: dpal ldan mdzes pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lha yi tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba'i //
analyzed: dpal ldan mdzes pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lha yi tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba'i //
translated: The glorious, beautiful orb of light, surrounded by a host of gods.

original: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar nam langs pa'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar nam langs pa'o //
translated: You, O Lord of the Ten Powers, are always the first to rise.

original: bdud kyi dpung las rnam par rgyal ba nyam nga'i lam ni gcod mdzad pa //
analyzed: bdud kyi dpung las rnam par rgyal ba nyam nga'i lam ni gcod mdzad pa //
translated: You have conquered the army of Mara and cut the path to the lower realms.

original: sa gsum phan par mdzad pa 'khri shing dra ba gsum po dral mdzad pa //
analyzed: sa gsum phan par mdzad pa 'khri shing dra ba gsum po dral mdzad pa //
translated: You have helped the three worlds and torn the net of the three fetters.

original: zhi ba'i bde ba rtsol bar mdzad pa mi shes ri bo 'jig @239b mdzad pa //
analyzed: zhi ba'i bde ba rtsol bar mdzad pa mi shes ri bo 'jig @239b mdzad pa //
translated: You have sought the bliss of peace and destroyed the mountain of ignorance.

original: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar nam langs pa'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar nam langs pa'o //
translated: You, O Lord of the Ten Powers, are always the first to rise.

original: gang zhig lha min mi dang lha rnams kyi yang sngon du bde ba'i gnas thob pa //
analyzed: gang zhig lha min mi dang lha rnams kyi yang sngon du bde ba'i gnas thob pa //
translated: You have attained the state of happiness before the gods, asuras, and humans.

original: ma lus pa yis yi khams su 'jig rten bdun bsdus dbyangs gsangs mthon po sgrogs //
analyzed: ma lus pa yis yi khams su 'jig rten bdun bsdus dbyangs gsangs mthon po sgrogs //
translated: You have proclaimed your lofty song in the seven worlds of the desire realm.

original: shed las skyes pa bsgo byed rang byung pad+ma'i skye gnas can ni gnyid log gyur //
analyzed: shed las skyes pa bsgo byed rang byung pad+ma'i skye gnas can ni gnyid log gyur //
translated: The self-arisen one born from the lotus is asleep.

original: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar nam langs pa'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar nam langs pa'o //
translated: You, O Lord of the Ten Powers, are always the first to rise.

original: shar gyi ri bo'i rtse yi ngos la gnas shing dmar ba'i 'od kyis rnam gnon pa //
analyzed: shar gyi ri bo'i rtse yi ngos la gnas shing dmar ba'i 'od kyis rnam gnon pa //
translated: Dwelling on the eastern peak of the mountain, overpowering with its red light,

original: mun pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms par byed pa skye dgu rnams kyi mig gcig pu //
analyzed: mun pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms par byed pa skye dgu rnams kyi mig gcig pu //
translated: Destroying the mass of darkness, the sole eye of the people,

original: nyi ma de yang myos pas 'phyan zhing rnam pa kun du gnyid log gyur //
analyzed: nyi ma de yang myos pas 'phyan zhing rnam pa kun du gnyid log gyur //
translated: That sun too, wandering inebriated, has fallen asleep in every way.

original: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
translated: But you, O Possessor of the Ten Powers, are always wide awake from the very beginning.

original: glang po'i mche ltar dkar bsil gsal ba'i zer can ri bong mtshan //
analyzed: glang po'i mche ltar dkar bsil gsal ba'i zer can ri bong mtshan //
translated: The moon, with rays as white and cool as an elephant's tusk, the rabbit-marked,

original: mtshan mo thig le lta bur mdzes pa kun gyi gtsug gi nor bu gang //
analyzed: mtshan mo thig le lta bur mdzes pa kun gyi gtsug gi nor bu gang //
translated: The beautiful crest-jewel of all, like a drop in the night,

original: dman pa'i mdangs dang bral ba de yang rnam pa kun du gnyid log gyur //
analyzed: dman pa'i mdangs dang bral ba de yang rnam pa kun du gnyid log gyur //
translated: That too, devoid of inferior radiance, has fallen asleep in every way.

original: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
translated: But you, O Possessor of the Ten Powers, are always wide awake from the very beginning.

original: rab mchog lag pa bzhi pa bcu drug phyed phyed phyogs kyi gdong pa can //
analyzed: rab mchog lag pa bzhi pa bcu drug phyed phyed phyogs kyi gdong pa can //
translated: The excellent one with four hands, the sixteen-part, the quarter-faced,

original: bzlas dang nyes pa'i chog shes shing nges brjod rig byed 'don pa po //
analyzed: bzlas dang nyes pa'i chog shes shing nges brjod rig byed 'don pa po //
translated: The reciter, the knower of the rules of sin and virtue, the chanter of the Veda,

original: dri med pad+ma'i skye gnas tshangs pa de yang rab tu gnyid log 'gyur //
analyzed: dri med pad+ma'i skye gnas tshangs pa de yang rab tu gnyid log 'gyur //
translated: And that Brahma, born from the immaculate lotus, is also deeply asleep.

original: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
translated: You, O Lord of the Ten Powers, are always wide awake.

original: gangs kyi ri bo'i rtse la gnas shing sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa 'chang //
analyzed: gangs kyi ri bo'i rtse la gnas shing sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa 'chang //
translated: Residing on the peak of the snow mountain, wearing a snake as a sacred thread,

original: grong khyer sum brtsegs bsregs par nus gang stag gi pags pa'i gos gyon pa //
analyzed: grong khyer sum brtsegs bsregs par nus gang stag gi pags pa'i gos gyon pa //
translated: Capable of burning the triple city, wearing a tiger skin as a garment,

original: rtse gsum can rtags ri mchog bu mo dang ni lhan cig gnyid log gyur //
analyzed: rtse gsum can rtags ri mchog bu mo dang ni lhan cig gnyid log gyur //
translated: Sleeping with the daughter of the best of mountains, marked with a trident,

original: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
translated: You, O Lord of the Ten Powers, are always wide awake.

original: 'bar ba'i rdo rje lag na thogs shing lha min rnams kyis thub dka' ba //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i rdo rje lag na thogs shing lha min rnams kyis thub dka' ba //
translated: Holding a blazing vajra in his hand, invincible to the asuras,

original: lha yi gtso bo bde sogs bdag po rmongs pa'i bsam pas rnam par 'khor //
analyzed: lha yi gtso bo bde sogs bdag po rmongs pa'i bsam pas rnam par 'khor //
translated: The chief of the gods, the lord of the world of Brahma, wanders about with a deluded mind,

original: mtshan mo min dang mtshan mo gnyid log 'dod pa'i 'dam du nges par bying //
analyzed: mtshan mo min dang mtshan mo gnyid log 'dod pa'i 'dam du nges par bying //
translated: Deeply sunk in the mud of desire, sleeping at night and during the day,

original: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
translated: You, O Lord of the Ten Powers, are always wide awake.

original: autpala sngon po'i 'dab ma ltar sngo pad+mo ltar dkar yangs pa'i mig / lha min gtso bo thams cad bcom gyur thams cad byed po sna tshogs gzugs //
analyzed: autpala sngon po'i 'dab ma ltar sngo pad+mo ltar dkar yangs pa'i mig / lha min gtso bo thams cad bcom gyur thams cad byed po sna tshogs gzugs //
translated: he is the destroyer of all the chief titans, the creator of all, the multiform.

original: khyab 'jug kyang ni yun ring gnyid log mngal gyi gnas las thar ma gyur //üîΩstobs @240a * //
analyzed: khyab 'jug kyang ni yun ring gnyid log mngal gyi gnas las thar ma gyur // stobs @240a * //
translated: Even Vishnu, having long slept, has not yet left his watery bed.

original: bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar nam langs pa'o //
analyzed: bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar nam langs pa'o //
translated: You, O Mighty One, are always awake at dawn.üîΩHe who has matted locks of tawny hue, a red copper hue, eyes of blood,

original: gang zhig ral pa ser skya'i tshogs ldan dmar po zangs mdog khrag gi mig / phyugs bdag dga' ba'i dus su gcig tu chags pa 'joms par nus pa po //
analyzed: gang zhig ral pa ser skya'i tshogs ldan dmar po zangs mdog khrag gi mig / phyugs bdag dga' ba'i dus su gcig tu chags pa 'joms par nus pa po //
translated: who is able to destroy the attachment of the single-minded lord of cattle at the time of his pleasure,

original: 'dod pa'i lha yi mnga' sreg lus can ma lha de yang gnyid log gyur //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i lha yi mnga' sreg lus can ma lha de yang gnyid log gyur //
translated: that god of the gods of love, Kama, has fallen asleep.

original: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
translated: You, O Mighty One, are always awake at dawn.

original: zla ba kha ba ku mu ta mtshungs chang 'thungs mig ni dmar gyur la //
analyzed: zla ba kha ba ku mu ta mtshungs chang 'thungs mig ni dmar gyur la //
translated: The moon, like a white water lily, has drunk wine, his eyes are red,

original: 'dod pa brtan sra sgeg po thong gshol lag na 'dzin par brtson //
analyzed: 'dod pa brtan sra sgeg po thong gshol lag na 'dzin par brtson //
translated: he is desirous, firm, handsome, and eager to take up his plow.

original: stobs can de ni nam gru'i mgul nas 'khyud cing 'di na nyal ba gyur //
analyzed: stobs can de ni nam gru'i mgul nas 'khyud cing 'di na nyal ba gyur //
translated: He, the powerful one, is sleeping, embracing the neck of the swan.

original: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
translated: You, the one endowed with the ten powers, are always awake very early.

original: glang chen gdong can mche ba gtsigs pa rnam pa kun du bgegs byed pa //
analyzed: glang chen gdong can mche ba gtsigs pa rnam pa kun du bgegs byed pa //
translated: The elephant-faced one, with bared tusks, is an obstacle in every way.

original: 'gram pa'i ngos gnyis myos chu rab 'bab bung bsgrags sangs mthon po sgrogs pa yi //
analyzed: 'gram pa'i ngos gnyis myos chu rab 'bab bung bsgrags sangs mthon po sgrogs pa yi //
translated: On both sides of his cheeks, the intoxicating drink flows, and the high-pitched sound of bees resounds.

original: tshogs kyi bdag po yang ni chang gi btung bas rab tu myos par gyur ;
analyzed: tshogs kyi bdag po yang ni chang gi btung bas rab tu myos par gyur ;
translated: Even the lord of the assembly is completely intoxicated by the drink of beer.

original: / stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
analyzed: / stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
translated: You, the one endowed with the ten powers, are always awake very early.

original: zar ma'i me tog ltar sngo gang gi lag pa mchog na mdung thung thogs //
analyzed: zar ma'i me tog ltar sngo gang gi lag pa mchog na mdung thung thogs //
translated: The one with hands holding a short spear, blue like a jasmine flower,

original: pad+mo gsar pa lta bu'i lus can gdong drug lha min khrung khrung gsod //
analyzed: pad+mo gsar pa lta bu'i lus can gdong drug lha min khrung khrung gsod //
translated: The one with a body like a fresh lotus, killing the demon with six faces and a crane,

original: mig gsum ldan pa gzhon nu'i tshul can de yang gnyid mthug log par gyur ;
analyzed: mig gsum ldan pa gzhon nu'i tshul can de yang gnyid mthug log par gyur ;
translated: The one with three eyes, in the form of a youth, is also sleeping deeply.

original: / stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
analyzed: / stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
translated: You, O Lord of the Ten Powers, are always awake at the right time.

original: zas la rab chags dman lus rtag par rnal 'byor rjes su dga' gyur pa //
analyzed: zas la rab chags dman lus rtag par rnal 'byor rjes su dga' gyur pa //
translated: Those who are attached to food, who have inferior bodies, and who always delight in yoga,

original: gnod pa sna tshogs rnam mang dang ldan yi dags lta bur tshig pa'i lus //
analyzed: gnod pa sna tshogs rnam mang dang ldan yi dags lta bur tshig pa'i lus //
translated: who have many kinds of various afflictions, and whose bodies are like those of hungry ghosts who are burning,

original: zla dpung 'gro ba rnam bral ba gang yin gcer bu de rnams kyang gnyid log / stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
analyzed: zla dpung 'gro ba rnam bral ba gang yin gcer bu de rnams kyang gnyid log / stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
translated: those who are separated from the moon and the stars, those who are naked, they all sleep. You, O Lord of the Ten Powers, are always awake at the right time.üîΩIn this great forest dwelling, the sages Angiras, PƒÅrƒÅ≈õara, and others,

original: bas mtha'i gnas chen 'di na drang srong ngan spong aam gi ra sa dang // kun du rgyu sogs gnas 'jog rgyas pa grog mkhar ba dang dga' byed rnams //
analyzed: bas mtha'i gnas chen 'di na drang srong ngan spong aam gi ra sa dang // kun du rgyu sogs gnas 'jog rgyas pa grog mkhar ba dang dga' byed rnams //
translated: the wandering mendicants and the rest, VƒÅsi·π£·π≠ha, ƒÄpastamba, and HƒÅrƒ´ta,

original: gzhon nu ma yi skye gnas chags shing rmongs pa rnams kyang gnyid log gyur ;
analyzed: gzhon nu ma yi skye gnas chags shing rmongs pa rnams kyang gnyid log gyur ;
translated: those who are attached to the wombs of young women and are deluded, they all sleep.

original: / stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
analyzed: / stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
translated: You, O Lord of the Ten Powers, are always awake at the right time.

original: gshin rje chu lha lus ngan gnod sbyin 'dre dang lto 'phye'i dbang po dang // de bzhin 'jig rten skyong gzhan lha yul sa stengs nam mkha' la gnas pa //
analyzed: gshin rje chu lha lus ngan gnod sbyin 'dre dang lto 'phye'i dbang po dang // de bzhin 'jig rten skyong gzhan lha yul sa stengs nam mkha' la gnas pa //
translated: and the other LokapƒÅlas, who dwell in the heavens, on earth, and in the sky,

original: gzhon nu ma la rab chags zur gyis lta de rnams kyang gnyid log @240b gyur ;
analyzed: gzhon nu ma la rab chags zur gyis lta de rnams kyang gnyid log @240b gyur ;
translated: and the young women who are so attached to him, looking askance, they too have fallen asleep.

original: / stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
analyzed: / stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
translated: You, O Lord of the Ten Powers, are always the first to awaken.

original: srid pa'i rgya mtshor bying gyur gti mug dra bas khebs pa'i lus //
analyzed: srid pa'i rgya mtshor bying gyur gti mug dra bas khebs pa'i lus //
translated: Those who are sunk in the ocean of existence, their bodies covered by the net of delusion,

original: thub pa ser skya gzeg zan kun du 'khor zhing blun po'i bsam pa can //
analyzed: thub pa ser skya gzeg zan kun du 'khor zhing blun po'i bsam pa can //
translated: the sages Kapila, Ka·πáƒÅda, and the rest, wandering about, with foolish ideas,

original: zhi ba'i bde ba yongs su nyams de rnams kyang gnyid log gyur //
analyzed: zhi ba'i bde ba yongs su nyams de rnams kyang gnyid log gyur //
translated: deprived of the bliss of peace, they too have fallen asleep.

original: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o //
translated: You, O Lord of the Ten Powers, are always the first to awaken.

original: mi shes mtshan mo mun par sred pa'i mal cha mthug gyon cing //
analyzed: mi shes mtshan mo mun par sred pa'i mal cha mthug gyon cing //
translated: Those who are clothed in the thick bedding of craving in the night of ignorance,

original: yul gyi sngas rten la ni rab mthug gnyid log gyur pa'i tshe //
analyzed: yul gyi sngas rten la ni rab mthug gnyid log gyur pa'i tshe //
translated: and have fallen asleep on the pillow of objects, deeply attached,

original: dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu yongs su 'gre ldog byed pa na //
analyzed: dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu yongs su 'gre ldog byed pa na //
translated: When the results of virtue and nonvirtue are fully exchanged,

original: rtag pa gnyid du gnyid sad gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo ;
analyzed: rtag pa gnyid du gnyid sad gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo ;
translated: Homage to him who is awake, though always asleep.

original: / chu 'gram dag tu ba lang rigs brgya rnams kyis chu 'thungs te //
analyzed: / chu 'gram dag tu ba lang rigs brgya rnams kyis chu 'thungs te //
translated: When a hundred types of cattle drink the water at the edge of a pond,

original: ngoms nas 'gro bar gyur na'ang chu la bri bar mngon pa med //
analyzed: ngoms nas 'gro bar gyur na'ang chu la bri bar mngon pa med //
translated: Though they are satisfied and go away, no decrease in the water is seen.

original: de bzhin thub pa snyan ngag mkhan brgyas yang dag bstod gyur kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin thub pa snyan ngag mkhan brgyas yang dag bstod gyur kyang //
translated: In the same way, though the Sage is praised by a hundred poets,

original: yon tan rgya mtsho legs pa'i gter chen zad par 'gyur ma yin //
analyzed: yon tan rgya mtsho legs pa'i gter chen zad par 'gyur ma yin //
translated: The ocean of his good qualities, that great treasure, is not exhausted.üîΩWhen the sun rises, the world is illuminated by its light,üîΩAnd the darkness that has settled for a long time is destroyed.

original: rab tu nam langs khyod gcig pu yi ye shes spyan phye bstod gyur pas //
analyzed: rab tu nam langs khyod gcig pu yi ye shes spyan phye bstod gyur pas //
translated: In the same way, when the sun of your wisdom rises,

original: 'jig rten gsum mgon rta bdun 'od kyis 'gro 'di rtag tu snang byas te //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum mgon rta bdun 'od kyis 'gro 'di rtag tu snang byas te //
translated: The darkness of the three worlds is destroyed.

original: sna tshogs lam thob lam ngan las bzlog 'byor ldan dpal gyi bya ba dag / dogs med rang dgar bde blag dngos grub rnam pa kun du spyod gyur cig / rab tu snga bas nam langs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la kha che'i rgyal po
analyzed: sna tshogs lam thob lam ngan las bzlog 'byor ldan dpal gyi bya ba dag / dogs med rang dgar bde blag dngos grub rnam pa kun du spyod gyur cig / rab tu snga bas nam langs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la kha che'i rgyal po
translated: May they obtain the path of variety and turn away from the bad path, and may they always practice the siddhis of the glorious deeds of the wealthy, carefree, and easygoing.

original: shr'i ha ri sha de bas brjod pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: shr'i ha ri sha de bas brjod pa rdzogs so /
translated: The narration of the perfect Buddha's visit to Kashmir by King Shrishahadeva is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po panti ta r'a dza shr'i dzny'a na mi tra dang / lo ts'a ba khe'u brgad yon tan dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po panti ta r'a dza shr'i dzny'a na mi tra dang / lo ts'a ba khe'u brgad yon tan dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o//
translated: Translated by the Indian abbot Pandit Rajashri Jnana Mitra and the Tibetan translator Kheu Barged Yonten Pal.
